name: midnight-aurora
title: Midnight Aurora
description: A dark, elegant theme with aurora-inspired accent colors. Features deep navy backgrounds with vibrant teal, purple, and pink accents. Perfect for dashboards, developer tools, and modern SaaS applications.
author: Token Atelier

ai_instructions.summary: Midnight Aurora is a dark theme with deep navy backgrounds and aurora-colored accents (teal, purple, pink). Best for developer tools, dashboards, and modern SaaS apps.
installation_order: 2. Copy globals.css to src/styles/globals.css (or merge with existing)
4. Copy all components from components/ to src/components/ui/
6. Import globals.css in your app entry point
7. (Optional) Create a route for Showcase component to preview all components
ai_instructions.showcase_usage: The Showcase component renders all UI components for preview. User should create a route (e.g., app/showcase/page.tsx) that imports and renders <Showcase /> from @/components/ui/showcase. This provides live preview with automatic CSS sync when editing styles.
ai_instructions.auth_note: This is a premium style. User needs a Token Atelier API key. Check for .tokenatelier.json config in project root or home directory, or ask user for their API key.
